node.name: SCA Tools
node.shortdescription:
The SCA Tools plugin provides a set of tools for the Service Component Architecture (SCA) set of standards: the SCA Composite Designer, a graphical (GMF) development environment for the construction of composite applications, an XML Editor for composite and componentType files, a launcher to run and debug SCA Java projects on SCA platforms from Eclipse,...

Have a look to our website: http://www.eclipse.org/stp/sca/index.php
and our wiki: http://wiki.eclipse.org/STP/SCA_Project
node.body:
The SCA Tools plugin provides a set of tools for the Service Component Architecture (SCA) set of standards: the SCA Composite Designer, a graphical (GMF) development environment for the construction of composite applications, an XML Editor for composite and componentType files, a launcher to run and debug SCA Java projects on SCA platforms from Eclipse,...

Have a look to our website: http://www.eclipse.org/stp/sca/index.php
and our wiki: http://wiki.eclipse.org/STP/SCA_Project
